snippet.title: Towards a Perilous Journey - Chronicle 1 | Oculus Rift | HTC Vive | WMR
snippet.description:
Here is the very first chronicle of Towards a Perilous Journey. There are only two types of enemies here. Be careful though, because blue enemies will surprise you more than once, and yellow ones let you no other solutions than anticipating the trajectory of theirs bullets.

Steam Store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/852860/ads=yt
Itch.io Store: https://sparklygames.itch.io/towards-a-perilous-journey

Music : Venga Bus by Pierlo (CC BY)
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Pierlo/Olivetti_Prodest/07_Venga_Bus
